Uses of Interface
org.openstreetmap.osm.Plugins.IPlugin

Packages that use IPlugin
org.openstreetmap.osm Provides basic interface to write programs that work with OpenStreetMap-data. 
org.openstreetmap.osm.data.projection Provides basic classes for working with projections of coordinates in OpenStreetMap-data 
org.openstreetmap.osm.data.searching Provides basic classes for searching for names and addresses in OpenStreetMap-data
